newsitem.title: UK: Many British Ford workers could lose jobs-paper.
newsitem.headline: Many British Ford workers could lose jobs-paper.

text.p: Ford's Transit van factory in Southampton could face closure threatening 2,000 workers with unemployment, according to a report in Sunday's Observer newspaper.
The report said there were fears that production of a new Transit van would be concentrated in Genk, Belgium, at the expense of Southampton as the company tried to stem financial losses.
This follows the recent announcement that Ford would not build the next Escort at Halewood and 1,300 workers would lose their jobs.
The General Workers' Union was unavailable for comment on Sunday.
